text: Armando Romero Gil (born 27 August 1949) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Armando Romero (equestrian)
